synopsis.text: New era, new heroes. The Hidden Leaf Village, once a hub of shinobi, has transformed into a bustling metropolis thriving in peace and technological advancements under the leadership of the Seventh Hokage, Naruto Uzumaki. Amidst towering buildings and flashing screens, the life of a ninja takes a new turn. At the heart of this change is Boruto Uzumaki, Naruto's prodigious yet headstrong son, eager to carve his own path and surpass his father's legendary status. Enrolled in the Ninja Academy, Boruto faces the challenge of proving himself to his peers and mending his strained relationship with his busy father. As mysterious events unfold, Boruto, along with his new friends and familiar faces, must rise to protect their carefree lives from an impending sinister force. Witness the unfolding of a new chapter in the shinobi world with "Boruto: Naruto Next Generations".
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
